entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
